name: Playtime's Over: Friendship and Bullets
description:
When a young boy's family moves into a new home, he finds himself scared and alone with only one friend in the world, his stuffed fox, Franklin. Little does the boy know that this new house is full of terrors. You must play as Franklin to stop the monsters that lurk at night, your only weapons are friendship, and bullets.

Music Solve the Damn Mystery by Jesse Spillane, Attribution License.
